title: The Marvellous march of Jean Francois
creator_credit: Witold Giersz, Israel M. Berman and Sterling International
brief_description: The wonderful adventures of Jean Francois, a small drummer boy in Napoleon’s Grande Armee. Ingenuity and steadfastness lead Jean Francois around the world and through the peril of war and the elements back to his homeland.
creator_credit_for_label: Witold Giersz, Israel M. Berman and Sterling International
